home.text_base_description: Expertly crafted Spanish Revival Architecture new construction home w/ character & charm. Fitted w/ modern amenities, expansive living areas & great attention to detail. This spacious Sunset Square home has a comfortable 4 bedrooms, 4.5 baths floor plan. It features beamed ceilings, a stunning Chef's kitchen w/ large center island, separate Bar & spacious dining area. Your spectacular master suite has custom dual closets, spa-like bath, Juliette balcony & tree top views. Bright and sunny location w/ mature greenery views out windows, is gated & affords optimal privacy for the most discerning buyer. You flow effortlessly to the back yard through a beautiful veranda opening to the outdoor dining deck, grassy yard, arched dual entry cabana plus Zen fire pit-conversation area enhanced with a striking fountain, all perfect for indoor/outdoor entertaining or intimate family time. Come experience classically designed luxury living, close to all the Sunset Strip and WEHO have to offer!
